document.docAuthor: Yurtseva, Olga V., Badmaeva, N. K. & Mavrodiev, Evgeny V.
document.docTitle: Atraphaxis selengensis Yurtseva & Badmaeva & Mavrodiev 2021, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: A broadly sampled 3 - loci plastid phylogeny of Atraphaxis (Polygoneae, Polygonoideae, Polygonaceae) reveals new taxa: II. Atraphaxis selengensis spec. nov., and A. davurica Jaub. & Spach from Russian Transbaikalia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A broadly sampled 3 - loci plastid phylogeny of Atraphaxis (Polygoneae, Polygonoideae, Polygonaceae) reveals new taxa: II. Atraphaxis selengensis spec. nov., and A. davurica Jaub. & Spach from Russian Transbaikalia
